around 48 half_double_crochet do not fasten_off sizes medium and large round 9 * work 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 7 sts work 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat from * around 54 half_double_crochet do not fasten_off size large only round 10 * work 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 8 sts work 2 half_double_crochet in the next st repeat from * around 60 half_double_crochet do not fasten_off plain round rounds 8 9 10 11 12 14 16 18 work 1 half_double_crochet in the first st and in each st around 42 48 54 60 half_double_crochet round 13 15 17 19 work 1 half_double_crochet in the first st and in each st around until there is only 1 st remaining work 1 single_crochet in the last st join with a slip_stitch to the first st of the round 42 48 54 60 sts do not fasten_off brim switch to a 5 50 mm i crochet hook hint you will no longer be working in a spiral fashion rounds 14 16 18 20 17 19 21 23 chain 1 working in the back loops only work 1 single_crochet in the first st and in each st around 42 48 54 60 single_crochet join with a slip_stitch to the first st of the round at the end of round 17 19 21 23 fasten_off sew in all yarn ends
